thread.title: Your Phone Is the Best Computer You Own—So Use It More

author: David Pierce
title: Your Phone Is the Best Computer You Own—So Use It More
text:
What’s the difference between your phone and a computer? Seriously, look at your phone, and at your laptop. What separates them? You’re probably thinking about power, memory and all the Serious Stuff phones can’t do.
For years, that was right. Phones were painfully slow next to desktops and laptops. Now, though, the iPhone’s processor bests the MacBook’s in many benchmarking tests.
Most...
